_comment: Example filter configuration - copy to config.json and customize
_services_help: List of services to monitor. Empty array = all services. Examples: Fortnite, Rocket League, Fall Guys, Epic Games Store, Epic Online Services, Unreal Engine
_min_impact_help: Minimum impact level for incidents: none (all), minor, major, critical
_event_types_help: Which event types to monitor: all, incidents, maintenance
_always_include_help: Keywords that always trigger notification regardless of other filters
_exclude_help: Keywords to always exclude from notifications
